text: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَأْتِيهِمْ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُا۟ مَا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translation.en.sahih: For they had denied the truth when it came to them, but there is going to reach them the news of what they used to ridicule.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya mereka telah mendustakan yang haq (Al-Quran) tatkala sampai kepada mereka, maka kelak akan sampai kepada mereka (kenyataan dari) berita-berita yang selalu mereka perolok-olokkan.
